pr_title: Display Developer Menu only in Debug Build

timeline.message: created activity to display dev menu from context and updated package name
start the developer menu activity and display developer menu on bottom of screen
changed styling of dev menu to overlay current view
only display dev menu if in debug mode
Merge branch 'DevMenu' into eeatonaws-dev-menu and fix merge conflict.

timeline.bodyText: Is there ever a real life scenario where getApplicationInfo could be null and thus throw a null exception here? If not this is fine, otherwise might be worth checking that ahead of accessing the flags attribute.
timeline.author: TrekSoft

replies.bodyText: I don't think getApplicationInfo could return null because the ApplicationInfo object returned by getApplicationInfo corresponds to the application tag (and its contents) in AndroidManifest.xml, which is required to run the app.
replies.author: eeatonaws
